description: Try our easy to follow Vegan Buffalo Wings Bowls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bowl,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Jul 2020,Halal,Vegetarian,Rice,Vegan,Spinach,Cauliflower,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Vegan Buffalo Wings Bowls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Sift flour, garlic powder and paprika into a large bowl. Stir in salt. Make a well in the centre, then slowly pour in soda water, whisking to form a smooth batter.

Add cauliflower to batter and stir until lightly coated. Remove cauliflower, allowing excess batter to drain off. Arrange on baking tray in a single layer and scatter over chickpeas. Bake for 30 minutes, turning halfway. Drizzle over chilli sauce, toss to coat, then bake for a further 10 minutes or until golden and chickpeas are crisp.

Meanwhile, heat brown rice & quinoa according to packet instructions. Combine mayonnaise, lemon juice and chives in a bowl. Season. Divide rice mixture among bowls and top with spinach & rocket, cabbage, cucumber and cauliflower mixture. Drizzle over dressing to serve.
